column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Solomon wiee EWURADZE ne fie
column3: na ahemfie no si
column4: na Solomon n'apɛdze a ɔsɔ n'enyi dɛ ɔbɛyɛ nyinara yɛ no
column6: "nna EWURADZE yii noho kyerɛɛ Solomon ne mpɛn ebien
column7: dɛ mbrɛ oyii noho kyerɛɛ no wɔ Gibeon no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Matse wo mpaabɔ na wo ntotɔserɛ a ayɛ no wɔ m'enyim no: mayɛ fie a esi yi krɔnkrɔn
column4: dɛ medze me dzin mobɔto hɔ daa; na m'enyiwa na m'akoma atsena hɔ daa nyina."

column2: "Na ɔwo dze
column3: sɛ enantsew m'enyim dɛ mbrɛ w'egya David nantsewee no
column6: dɛ ebɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ dza medze ahyɛ wo nyinara tse
column7: na edzi m'ahyɛdze na m'atsɛmbu do a;"

column2: "ɔno mebɛma w'ahendzi ahengua etsim wɔ Israel do daa; dɛ mbrɛ medze bɔɔ w'egya David anohoba no
column3: dɛ
column4: Israel ahengua do nyimpa rommbɔ wo no."

column2: "Mbom sɛ hom san fi m'ekyir
column3: hom anaa hom mba
column4: na woenndzi me mbransɛm na m'ahyɛdze a medze esi hom enyim yi do
column5: na hom kɔ kɔsom enyame fofor

column2: "ɔno mubotwa Israel efi asaase a medze ama hɔn no do; na fie a mayɛ no krɔnkrɔn ama me dzin yi mobɔtow efi m'enyim akyen; na Israel bɛdan ɔkasabɛbu na fen wɔ aman nyinara mu:"
"na ɔdan yi krɔn kɔ sor dze
column3: naaso obiara a obotwa mu wɔ ho no
column5: na ɔabɔ nhwiroma; na wɔase dɛ
column6: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na EWURADZE ayɛ asaase yi

column2: "Na wobobua dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ wɔpoow EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn a ɔdze hɔn egyanom fi Egypt asaase do bae no
column4: na wɔkɛtae suoo enyame fofor mu sɔɔr hɔn
column5: na wɔsoom hɔn: dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE dze mbusu yi nyinara aba hɔn do yi."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe eduonu no a Solomon dze sisii efie ebien no
column3: mekyerɛ EWURADZE ne fie na ɔhen ne dze no
column6: "(afei nna Taerehen Hiram dze nkyindur ndua na ɔpepeaa
column8: dɛ mbrɛ n'apɛdze tse nyinara ama Solomon
column9: ) nna ɔhen Solomon maa Hiram nkurow eduonu wɔ Galilii asaase do."

column2: "Na Hiram fiir edzi fii Taere dɛ ɔrobɔhwɛ nkurow a Solomon dze ama no no; na wɔannsɔ n'enyi."
"Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mo nua
column4: ebɛn nkurow nye yi na edze ama me yi? Na ɔfrɛɛ no Kabul asaase (asaasebɔn) dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na Hiram somaa ma wɔdze sika dwetsir kɛse ɔha eduonu kɛmaa ɔhen no."
"Na iyi nye siantsir a ɔhen Solomon gyegyee ɔtowyi edwuma; dɛ ɔdze besi EWURADZE ne fie
column3: na nankasa ne fi

column2: "Nna Egypthen Farao afow akɔ akɛgye Gezer
column3: na ɔdze ogya ahyew no
column4: na oekuku Keenanfo a wɔtse kurow no mu no. Afei ɔdze maa ne babaa a Solomon waar no no

column2: "Na Solomon kyekyeer Gezer bio
column3: na Bɛt-horon anaafo no
column6: na Tamar wɔ sar no do
column9: "na adzekora nkurow a Solomon wɔ no nyinara
column12: na dza Solomon pɛ dɛ osi gye n'enyi wɔ Jerusalɛm
column14: na n'ahendzi asaase no nyinara mu."

column2: "Nkorɔfo a wɔkae wɔ Amorifo
column3: na Hitifo
column6: na Jebusfo mu a wommfi Israelmba mu no dze;"

column2: "hɔn mba a wɔkaa hɔn ekyir wɔ asaase no do no a Israelmba enntum annsɛɛ hɔn pasapasa no
column3: hɔn na Solomon gyegyee hɔn enyadze ɔtowyi edwuma dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Naaso Israelmba no mu dze
column3: Solomon annyɛ hɔn mu biara ɔtowyifo; mbom hɔn na wɔyɛɛ mbarimba akofo
column4: na ne gyasefo na ne mbapɔmba
column6: na ne ntseaseanam na no mpɔnkɔdofo do mpanyimfo."

column2: "Woyinom nye Solomon n'edwuma do ahwɛdofo mu mpanyin
column3: ahaenum eduonum a wɔhwɛ nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ edwuma no do."

column2: "Na Farao babaa no fii David kurow no mu baa ne fi a Solomon sii maa no no mu: nna osii Millo."
"Na afrenhyia mu mpɛn ebiasa na Solomon bobɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia a osii maa EWURADZE no do
column3: ɔhyew eduhuam ka ho
column4: wɔ afɔrmbukyia a osi EWURADZE enyim no do. Dɛm na ɔdze wiee ofi no."

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon yɛɛ ahɛn wɔ Ezion-geber a ɔwɔ Elot nkyɛn
column3: wɔ Mbɛw Po no no mpoano

column2: "Na Hiram somaa no nkowaa
column3: apofomba a wɔwɔ po ho nyimdzee
column4: ma wɔkɛkaa Solomon no nkowaa ho wɔ ahɛn no mu."

column2: "Na wɔkɔr Ofir
column3: na wɔkɛfaa hɔ sika
